eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
i \partial_\mu \psi^\mu &=& H^0\psi + H_\mu\psi^\mu , \\
i \partial_\mu \psi &=& H^0\psi_\mu + H_\mu\psi , \\ 
i\partial_{[\mu} \psi_{\nu ]} &=& H_{[\mu}\psi_{\nu ]} .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{{\bf H}}[A({\bf x}), p^i_a ({\bf x})] 
&:=& \int \! d{\bf x}\, 
\left ( p^i_a ({\bf x}) \partial_{_t} A^a_i ({\bf x}) - L \right ) 
\nonumber \\
&=& \int \! d{\bf x}\, 
\left ( \frac{1}{2} p^i_a({\bf x}) p^i_a({\bf x}) 
%F_a^{i0} F_a^{i0} 
+ \frac{1}{4}  F_a{}^{ij}({\bf x}) F_a{}^{ij}({\bf x})  \right ) . 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
i\partial_t {\bf \Psi} &=& tr \left \{ ||{\bf \Psi}||\varkappa 
\int \!d{\bf x}\, \Psi_\Sigma^{-1} i\partial_t \Psi_\Sigma   
\right \} , 
\\ 
\frac{\delta{\bf \Psi}}{\delta A^i_a({\bf x})}  &=&
tr \left \{   ||{\bf \Psi}|| \varkappa \Psi_\Sigma^{-1}  \frac{\partial}{\partial A_a^i} \Psi_\Sigma   
\right \} , 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\frac{\delta^2{\bf \Psi}  }{\delta A_i^a({\bf x})\delta A_i^a({\bf x})}  
 &=& tr \left \{   ||{\bf \Psi}|| \left (
\varkappa^2 \Psi_\Sigma^{-1} \frac{\partial}{\partial A_a^i} \Psi_\Sigma \Psi_\Sigma^{-1} \frac{\partial}{\partial A_a^i} \Psi_\Sigma  
\right . \right . \nonumber \\
&& \hspace*{-65pt}\left . \left .  
- \varkappa\delta^{n-1} (0) \Psi_\Sigma^{-1} \frac{\partial}{\partial A_a^i} \Psi_\Sigma \Psi_\Sigma^{-1} \frac{\partial}{\partial A_a^i} \Psi_\Sigma  
  + \varkappa\delta^{n-1} (0) \Psi_\Sigma^{-1} 
\frac{\partial^2}{\partial A_a^i\partial A_a^i } \Psi_\Sigma \right ) 
\right \} . 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\partial_A (iN) \partial_A (iN) &=& -\frac{1}{4}g^2 CAACAA , 
\nonumber \\  
igCA\!\not\hspace{-3.5pt} A\,\partial_A (iN) &=& - \frac{1}{2} g^2CAACAA , 
\\ 
\partial_{AA} N &=& 0,  \nonumber  
\
